name: Tough Elixir
description: Grants a X-level toughness effect, which fortifies your bones to strengthen your defense. Best to use before facing off against hard-hitting enemies.

name: Spicy Elixir
description: Warms your body from its core, increasing your resistance to cold environments. Very useful in the snow-covered mountains.

name: Sneaky Elixir
description: Grants a X-level stealth effect, which calms the nerves and silences footfalls. Allows you to move about undetected by monsters and animals.

name: Mighty Elixir
description: NULL

name: Hearty Elixir
description: Restores you to full health and increases your maximum hearts. The additional hearts are lost as you take damage.

name: Hasty Elixir
description: Grants a X-level haste effect, which boosts your movement speed while running, swimming, or climbing.

name: Fireproof Elixir
description: Grants a fireproof effect, which prevents your body from catching fire. Be sure to pack this when venturing out to explore Death Mountain.

name: Energizing Elixir
description: Restores your Stamina, which is used when performing physical actions such as climbing walls and swimming.

name: Enduring Elixir
description: Restores stamina and temporarily extends your Stamina Wheel. The additional stamina will disappear as it's used.

name: Electro Elixir
description: Grants a X-level resistance to electricity. Useful against enemies with electrical attacks.

name: Frozen Bass
description: That's one cold fish. Eating it won't restore many hearts, but it will lower your body temperature a bit.

name: Frozen Hearty Bass
description: This hearty bass has been frozen by cool air. Eating it will be a challenge because it's frozen solid, but if you persevere, it will temporarily increase your heat resistance.

name: Frozen Bird Drumstick
description: It's as hard as a rock but is supposedly edible. It restores a small number of hearts and has a cooling effect.

name: Frozen Bird Thigh
description: High-quality, frozen bird meat. It's so solid it looks like it could be used as a weapon. Eating it will restore some hearts and cool you down, but don't break your teeth on it.

name: Frozen Whole Bird
description: This raw whole bird may have been frozen solid, but its flavor remains intact. Eating it will provide a temporary boost to your heat resistance.

name: Frozen Carp
description: The crunchy, icy texture of this chilled carp is quite the delicacy. Eating it will temporarily increase your heat resistance.

name: Frozen Crab
description: Doesn't provide as much companionship as an unfrozen crab, but it won't spoil during your travels. Eat it to gain a temporary boost to your heat resistance.

name: Frozen River Snail
description: The distinct glow of this sneaky river snail has diminished after it's been frozen, but eating it will provide a temporary increase to your heat resistance.

name: Frozen Trout
description: Being frozen has condensed the taste of fish inside this trout's body. Eating it will provide a temporary boost to your heat resistance.

name: Icy Hearty Blueshell Snail
description: It takes a skilled chef to get the meat out of this frozen hearty blueshell snail. Eating this will provide a temporary increase to your heat resistance.

name: Icy Meat
description: A frozen slab of animal meat. If you can manage to chew it up and swallow it, you'll restore some hearts and lower your body temperature.

name: Icy Prime Meat
description: High-quality, frozen animal meat. Doesn't restore many hearts, but it can lower your body temperature.

name: Icy Gourmet Meat
description: This raw gourmet meat has been frozen for easy traveling. It's kept its flavor through the freezing process. Eating it as is will provide a temporary boost to your heat resistance.

name: Chilly Elixir
description: Grants a X-level cooling effect, raising your body's resistance to heat. Crucial for long journeys through the desert.

name: Frozen Hearty Salmon
description: This salmon doesn't taste quite as fishy because the excess fat has been removed. It's exceptionally cold, so eating it provides a temporary boost to heat resistance.

name: Apple Pie
description: The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.

name: Carrot Cake
description: Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake.
ingredients: Tabantha Wheat,Cane Sugar,Goat Butter,Swift Carrot,Endura Carrot

name: Carrot Stew
description: This simple stew sat simmering for a long time to bring out the sweetness of the carrots.
ingredients: Fresh Milk,Goat Butter,Tabantha Wheat,Swift Carrot,Endura Carrot

name: Crab Omelet with Rice
description: The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.
ingredients: Hylian Rice,Bird Egg,Rock Salt,Ironshell Crab,Razorclaw Crab,Bright-Eyed Crab

name: Crab Risotto
description: An everyday stable of seaside villages, the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat.
ingredients: Hylian Rice,Goat Butter,Rock Salt,Ironshell Crab,Razorclaw Crab,Bright-Eyed Crab

name: Crab Stir-Fry
description: The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of the meat.

name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
description: The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!
ingredients: Any Mushroom,Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb,Fresh Milk,Rock Salt

name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
description: Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients.
ingredients: Any Vegetable (except Carrot or Pumpkin),Any Flower or Herb,Fresh Milk,Rock Salt

name: Creamy Heart Soup
description: Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together.

name: Creamy Meat Soup
description: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly-braised meat and many vegetables.
ingredients: Any Meat,Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb,Fresh Milk,Rock Salt

name: Creamy Seafood Soup
description: Thuck-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness.
ingredients: Any Seafood,Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb,Fresh Milk,Rock Salt

name: Curry Pilaf
description: The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma.

name: Curry Rice
description: A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.

name: Dubious Food
description: It's too gross to even look at. A bizarre smell issues forth from this heap. Eating it won't hurt you though...probably.
ingredients: Any Monster Part,Wood,Bladed Rhino Beetle,Rugged Rhino Beetle,Energetic Rhino Beetle,Cold Darner,Warm Darner,Electric Darner,Hearty Lizard,Hightail Lizard,Fireproof Lizard,Tireless Frog,Hot-Footed Frog,Restless Cricket,Summerwing Butterfly,Winterwing Butterfly,Smotherwing Butterfly,Thunderwing Butterfly,Sunset Firefly

name: Egg Pudding
description: Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold, its soft texture melts in your mouth.

name: Egg Tart
description: You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful.

name: Energizing Glazed Meat
description: The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat, giving it a complex taste profile.
ingredients: Courser Bee Honey,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Energizing Honey Candy
description: A natural sweet, brimming with nutrition and made by stewing fresh honey.

name: Energizing Honeyed Apple
description: A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey.

name: Fish Skewer
description: A simple dish made by cooking chunks of fresh fish on a skewer.
ingredients: Armored Carp,Armored Porgy,Voltfin Trout,Chillfin Trout,Sizzlefin Trout,Stealthfin Trout,Hearty Bass,Hyrule Bass,Staminoka Bass,Hearty Salmon,Sanke Carp,Mighty Carp

name: Copious Fish Skewers
description: It's just a whole heap of stuff shoved on to a skewer, but it's still a pretty tasty dish.

name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
description: A simple dish made by cooking skewered, fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Voltfin Trout,Chillfin Trout,Sizzlefin Trout,Stealthfin Trout,Sanke Carp,Mighty Carp,Armored Carp,Hearty Bass,Hyrule Bass,Staminoka Bass,Hearty Salmon

name: Fish Pie
description: A mainstay in any fisherman's home, the crisp crust pairs well with the fishy flavor.

name: Fragrant Mushroom Sauté
description: The fragrant aroma of this sautéed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Goron Spice

name: Fried Bananas
description: Children love fried mighty bananas. The trick is frying them over very high heat.

name: Fried Egg and Rice
description: The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish.

name: Fried Wild Greens
description: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.

name: Copious Fried Wild Greens
description: A healthy dish made by cooking mixed greens over a strong flame.
ingredients: Any 4 different Vegetables, Herbs or Flowers

name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
description: This dish contrasts the sweetness of fruit with the savoriness of mushrooms.
ingredients: Apple,Fleet-Lotus Seeds,Hearty Durian,Hydromelon,Mighty Bananas,Palm Fruit,Spicy Pepper,Voltfruit,Wildberry

name: Fruit Pie
description: A celebration isn't a celebration until this fruit-filled crust hits the table!
ingredients: Tabantha Wheat,Cane Sugar,Goat Butter,Fleet-Lotus Seeds,Hearty Durian,Hydromelon,Mighty Bananas,Palm Fruit,Spicy Pepper,Voltfruit,Wildberry

name: Fruitcake
description: Making ample use of fruits found all over Hyrule, this cake is a must for celebrations.
ingredients: Apple,Wildberry,Tabantha Wheat,Cane Sugar,Fleet-Lotus Seeds,Hearty Durian,Hydromelon,Mighty Bananas,Voltfruit,Palm Fruit,Spicy Pepper

name: Glazed Mushrooms
description: The honey in this mushroom dish gives it a sweet, complex taste and a savory finish.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Courser Bee Honey

name: Glazed Seafood
description: A seafood dish that you can actually wolf down whole!

name: Glazed Veggies
description: Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply sauté them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!
ingredients: Courser Bee Honey,Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb

name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl
description: Only the most carefully selected cuts of high-quality meats go into this dish.

name: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry
description: A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!

name: Gourmet Meat Curry
description: The high-quality meat used in this prized dish satisfies meat and curry lovers alike.

name: Gourmet Meat Stew
description: The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!
ingredients: Tabantha Wheat,Fresh Milk,Goat Butter,Raw Gourmet Meat

name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
description: Once served in Hyrule Castle, the poultry used in this dish is of immensely high quality.

name: Gourmet Poultry Pilaf
description: Made with the highest-quality poultry, every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor.
ingredients: Raw Whole Bird,Hylian Rice,Goat Butter,Bird Egg

name: Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer
description: The rich aroma and juicy texture of this high-quality meat puts it in a league of its own.

name: Hearty Clam Chowder
description: The nutritional value of hearty blueshell snail combines with butter and milk in a rich soup.
ingredients: Fresh Milk,Tabantha Wheat,Goat Butter,Hearty Blueshell Snail

name: Hearty Salmon Muenière
description: The crispy skin of this fried hearty salmon puts its texture in a class all its own.

name: Herb Sauté
description: A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices. It's easily recognized by its unique aroma.

name: Honey Crepe
description: Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their natural sweetness and flavor.
ingredients: Fresh Milk,Bird Egg,Tabantha Wheat,Cane Sugar,Courser Bee Honey

name: Honeyed Fruits
description: A dish that combines the thick sweetness of honey with the acidity of sour fruits.
ingredients: Courser Bee Honey,Fleet-Lotus Seeds,Hearty Durian,Hydromelon,Mighty Bananas,Voltfruit,Palm Fruit,Spicy Pepper,Wildberry

name: Hot Buttered Apple
description: The apple's sweetness has been enhanced by smothering it with butter and baking it.

name: Meat & Mushroom Skewer
description: A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with either Steak or Bird Meat.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Meat and Rice Bowl
description: This dish of rice and lightly seared meat is a mainstay all throughout Hyrule.
ingredients: Hylian Rice,Rock Salt,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Meat and Seafood Fry
description: A filling dish made by cooking fresh seafood and meat together.

name: Meat Curry
description: The heat from the spice allows you to enjoy the large portion of the meat's savoriness.

name: Meat Pie
description: You'll need an extra napkin to deal with this juicy pie of perfectly baked minced meat.
ingredients: Tabantha Wheat,Goat Butter,Rock Salt,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Meat Skewer
description: A juicy, filling snack made by grilling small chunks of meat on a skewer.
ingredients: Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Copious Meat Skewers
description: Just shove a bunch of meat on to a skewer and you're good to go.
ingredients: Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Meat Stew
description: The hearty meat in this mainstay dish leaves bellies satisfied all throughout Hyrule.

name: Meaty Rice Balls
description: The sweet and spicy meat stuffed into these rice balls will keep you full for some time.
ingredients: Hylian Rice,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Monster Cake
description: It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness.

name: Monster Curry
description: This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely on spices.

name: Monster Rice Balls
description: Rice balls flavored with monster extract. Their unique aroma is not for everyone.

name: Monster Soup
description: Using monster extract as a base, this soup's distinct gaminess is either loved or hated.

name: Monster Stew
description: Meat and seafood simmered in monster extract. A savory dish despite its ingredients.
ingredients: Monster Extract,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird,Hearty Bass,Hyrule Bass,Staminoka Bass,Voltfin Trout,Chillfin Trout,Sizzlefin Trout,Stealthfin Trout,Sanke Carp,Mighty Carp,Armored Carp,Hearty Salmon,Mighty Porgy,Armored Porgy,Sneaky River Snail,Hearty Blueshell Snail,Ironshell Crab,Razorclaw Crab,Bright-Eyed Crab

name: Mushroom Omelet
description: The fluffy texture of this omelet is one of the great joys of this dish, as well as life.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Rock Salt,Goat Butter,Bird Egg

name: Mushroom Rice Balls
description: The aroma of the mushrooms tickles your nose as you peel back the leafy wrapping.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Hylian Rice

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: The tantalizing aroma of mushrooms and butter beckons you to the table.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Rock Salt,Goat Butter,Hylian Rice

name: Mushroom Skewer
description: This simple mushroom-packed skewer has its colorful presentation to thank for its appeal.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle

name: Copious Mushrooms Skewers
description: Fans of fungal cuisine can't resist this simple mushroom-skewer dish. Very filling.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle

name: Nutcake
description: Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness.
ingredients: Tabantha Wheat,Cane Sugar,Goat Butter,Acorn,Chickaloo Tree Nut

name: Omelet
description: This simple dish is common all over Hyrule. Simply fry egg until it's nice and plump.

name: Pepper Seafood
description: The pepper seeds grilled with this seafood draw out its taste and pleasant aroma.

name: Plain Crepe
description: The simplicity of this dish lets the flavor of its ingredients shine.
ingredients: Fresh Milk,Cane Sugar,Tabantha Wheat,Bird Egg,Goat Butter

name: Porgy Meunière
description: Popular among residents of coastal regions, this juicy porgy is a delish dish.

name: Poultry Curry
description: The savory meat pairs well with the aroma of spice in this common curry.

name: Poultry Pilaf
description: Sautéed Hylian rice steamed in poultry broth. Cook on low heat until the rice is fluffy.
ingredients: Raw Bird Drumstick,Hylian Rice,Bird Egg,Goat Butter

name: Prime Meat and Rice Bowl
description: This bowl is loaded with high-quality meat. Your hunt for a serious meal ends here.

name: Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
description: This comfort dish is made with choice cuts of meat and seafood.

name: Prime Meat Curry
description: The high-quality meat in this curry has given it a deeper taste than most other curries.

name: Prime Meat Stew
description: Letting the large portions of choice cuts of meat simmer brought out their savoriness.
ingredients: Tabantha Wheat,Goat Butter,Fresh Milk,Raw Prime Meat

name: Prime Poultry Curry
description: The secret to this curry's flavor is taking it off the heat while you add the spices.

name: Prime Poultry Pilaf
description: The rice permeates the savory taste of the poultry in this Gerudo-region favorite.
ingredients: Raw Bird Thigh,Hylian Rice,Bird Egg,Goat Butter

name: Prime Spiced Meat Skewer
description: The simple preparation of this steak dish belies its complex taste profile.

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: The intense sweetness of fortified pumpkins makes this dessert popular among children.

name: Pumpkin Stew
description: Simply simmer a fortified pumpkin to make this dish. A favorite in Kakariko Village.

name: Rock-Hard Food
description: A dish gone awry after adding the wrong ingredient. Chewing your way through this won't be fun, but it will fill you up when you're between a rock and a hard place.

name: Salmon Risotto
description: The rice used in this rich risotto permeates the light flavor of the salmon.

name: Salt-Grilled Crab
description: Nine out of ten fishermen agree: crab is best enjoyed grilled and with just a bit of salt.

name: Salt-Grilled Fish
description: A simple dish made by rolling a whole fish in natural rock salt before grilling it.
ingredients: Rock Salt,Sneaky River Snail,Hearty Blueshell Snail,Hearty Bass,Hyrule Bass,Staminoka Bass,Sanke Carp,Mighty Carp,Armored Carp,Hearty Salmon,Mighty Porgy,Armored Porgy,Voltfin Trout,Chillfin Trout,Sizzlefin Trout,Stealthfin Trout

name: Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat
description: This lavish grilled dish makes liberal use of high-quality cuts of meat.

name: Salt-Grilled Greens
description: A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.
ingredients: Rock Salt,Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb

name: Salt-Grilled Meat
description: Short on ingredients? Just rub some meat in salt and cook it for a simple, tasty dish.

name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
description: A basic mushroom dish made by lightly salting mushrooms and grilling them.
ingredients: Rushroom,Sunshroom,Zapshroom,Ironshroom,Chillshroom,Razorshroom,Endura Shroom,Hylian Shroom,Silent Shroom,Stamella Shroom,Hearty Truffle,Big Hearty Truffle,Rock Salt

name: Salt-Grilled Prime Meat
description: A simple yet exquisite dish made by grilling high-quality meat on top of rock salt.

name: Sautéed Nuts
description: These sautéed tree seeds are the perfect snack for the busy adventurer on the go!

name: Seafood Curry
description: This dish brims with treasures from the sea. Its spice packs a kick, so it's not for kids.
ingredients: Goron Spice,Hylian Rice,Hearty Blueshell Snail,Mighty Porgy,Armored Porgy

name: Seafood Fried Rice
description: Various seafood has been sautéed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!
ingredients: Hylian Rice,Rock Salt,Hearty Blueshell Snail,Mighty Porgy,Armored Porgy

name: Seafood Meunière
description: Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love.
ingredients: Any Seafood (except Porgy or Salmon),Tabantha Wheat,Goat Butter

name: Seafood Paella
description: No fisherman's birthday bash would be complete without this top-shelf seafood dish.
ingredients: Hearty Blueshell Snail,Hylian Rice,Mighty Porgy,Armored Porgy

name: Seafood Rice Balls
description: Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints.

name: Seafood Skewer
description: The natural water in this medley of seafaring creatures makes for a delicious broth.
ingredients: Ironshell Crab,Razorclaw Crab,Bright-Eyed Crab,Sneaky River Snail,Hearty Blueshell Snail

name: Simmered Fruit
description: This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender.
ingredients: Apple,Fleet-Lotus Seeds,Hearty Durian,Hydromelon,Mighty Bananas,Palm Fruit,Spicy Pepper,Voltfruit,Wildberry

name: Copious Simmered Fruit
description: The flavors of the various fruits in this simmered dish exist in perfect harmony.
ingredients: Apple,Fleet-Lotus Seeds,Hearty Durian,Hydromelon,Mighty Bananas,Palm Fruit,Spicy Pepper,Voltfruit,Wildberry

name: Spiced Meat Skewer
description: A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat, allowing its flavor to shine.

name: Spicy Pepper Steak
description: A dish made by cooking meat in crushed peppers, suppressing the gamy taste while accentuating its flavor.
ingredients: Spicy Pepper,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Spicy Sautéed Peppers
description: The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.

name: Steamed Fish
description: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.
ingredients: Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb,Any Seafood

name: Steamed Fruit
description: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.
ingredients: Any Fruit,Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb

name: Steamed Meat
description: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.
ingredients: Any Meat,Any Flower or Herb,Any Vegetable (except Pumpkin)

name: Steamed Mushrooms
description: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.
ingredients: Any Mushroom,Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb

name: Tough Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
description: Grants a low-level defense boost. This hollow, meat-filled fortified pumpkin is a local specialty or Kakariko Village.
ingredients: Fortified Pumpkin,Raw Bird Thigh,Raw Bird Drumstick,Raw Gourmet Meat,Raw Meat,Raw Prime Meat,Raw Whole Bird

name: Vegetable Curry
description: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.
ingredients: Hylian Rice,Goron Spice,Swift Carrot,Endura Carrot,Fortified Pumpkin

name: Vegetable Omelet
description: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.
ingredients: Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb,Bird Egg,Goat Butter,Rock Salt

name: Vegetable Risotto
description: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.
ingredients: Hylian Rice,Goat Butter,Rock Salt,Fortified Pumpkin,Swift Carrot,Endura Carrot

name: Veggie Cream Soup
description: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.
ingredients: Fresh Milk,Rock Salt,Fortified Pumpkin,Swift Carrot,Endura Carrot

name: Veggie Rice Balls
description: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.
ingredients: Any Vegetable,Any Flower or Herb,Hylian Rice

name: Warm Milk
description: Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep.

name: Wheat Bread
description: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly.

name: Wildberry Crepe
description: Sweet, tart wildberries are folded into thin, springy dough to make this dessert.

name: Hard-Boiled Egg
description: A bird egg boiled using water from naturally occurring hot springs. It's popular among children and is easy to make.

name: Baked Apple
description: Direct heat has softened and sweetened this apple. Eat it to restore three quarters of a heart.

name: Baked Fortified Pumpkin
description: This fortified pumpkin has been roasted whole. The hard rind serves as a container for the steamed pumpkin flesh inside.

name: Baked Palm Fruit
description: This palm fruit was broiled with direct heat, resulting in steamed flesh inside the rind. Best served at the moment the juices emerge while roasting.

name: Blackened Crab
description: A whole crab slow-roasted in its shell. The soft, flaky flesh pairs nicely with the scent of the charred shell for a meal that assaults all five of your senses in all the best ways.

name: Blueshell Escargot
description: The shell of this hearty blueshell snail acted as a tiny slow cooker as it was roasted. Some people love the trademark bitterness of its tail meat.

name: Campfire Egg
description: Roasting a bird egg whole in its shell like this helps retain water, making the egg a bit chewier than usual.

name: Charred Pepper
description: A pepper that's been gently caressed by an open flame. It's much less spicy now.

name: Roasted Acorn
description: An acorn cooked with direct ehat. Its nutty armoa has been amplified.

name: Roasted Armoranth
description: Simple, roasted armoranth. The heat has frayed the hard, chewy fiber just enough to make it easy to eat.

name: Roasted Bass
description: A bass that's been cooked whole over an open flame. It's flaky and savory smelling. Offers more hearts than the raw version.

name: Roasted Hearty Bass
description: An open flame has crisped the skin of this hearty bass to perfection. It's a sizable portion and contains just the right amount of fat to create an exceptionally tasty dish.

name: Roasted Big Radish
description: A roasted big hearty radish. To take such a precious vegetable and put it to the fire is decadent in a way.

name: Roasted Bird Drumstick
description: Raw bird drumstick that's been cooked to a crisp, skin and all. It's devoid of seasoning, but it has a simple, accessible taste. Restores more hearts than the raw variety.

name: Roasted Bird Thigh
description: Prime meat that's been flame-seared to perfection. The outide is crispy, but the inside is juicy. Eat it to recover hearts.

name: Roasted Carp
description: Roasting this freshwater carp helped to supress some of its stench, making it easier to stomach. You can really sink your teeth into the thick, meaty flesh.

name: Roasted Hearty Durian
description: This hearty durian was roasted whole inside its hard shell. Unfortunately, roasting it did nothing to remove its distinct odor. Eat it to recover a lot of hearts.

name: Roasted Endura Carrot
description: This flame-kissed endura carrot makes for a truly extravagant single-item dish. The fire really brought out its sweetness.

name: Roasted Hydromelon
description: This hydromelon was roasted whole for a very soft and flaky inner flesh with a rather intriguing flavor. Now this is your money melon!

name: Roasted Lotus Seeds
description: Flame-roasted fleet-lotus seeds. Peel the skin back to get to the soft and flaky center.

name: Roasted Mighty Bananas
description: These mighty bananas have been roasted whole. Cooking them through has turned the fruit into a sticky, rich, aromatic syrup.

name: Roasted Mighty Thistle
description: Lightly toasted mighty thistle. It has no special effects, but now that it's been grilled, the pointy ends go down smooth.

name: Roasted Porgy
description: The soft and fluffy texture of this seafaring fish has been enhanced by roasting it over an open fire. The crisp, aromatic skin is particularly delicious.

name: Roasted Radish
description: A roasted hearty radish. Fragrant and warm, it has no special effect but will restore hearts.

name: Roasted Hearty Salmon
description: NULL

name: Roasted Swift Carrot
description: A fragrant swift carrot that's been lightly roasted. It doesn't have any special effects, but it will restore some health.

name: Roasted Tree Nut
description: A tree seed roasted to amplify its fragrance. Gives more hearts that the raw variety.

name: Roasted Trout
description: This trout can be found all over Hyrule. Served river-to-table, it's simply cooked for a soft and flaky flesh with a mild flavor.

name: Roasted Voltfruit
description: This voltfruit from the Gerudo Desert has been charred to really bring out its sweet and sour flavors.

name: Roasted Wildberry
description: This wildberry was prepared over an open flame to alter its sweet taste. It recovers more health than if eaten raw.

name: Roasted Whole Bird
description: This raw whole bird has been tickled by an open flame to bring out its flavor. Less is more, as the lack of additional seasoning allows its natural taste to shine.

name: Seared Gourmet Steak
description: The highest quality raw gourmet meat, just kissed by an open flame. No additional seasonings have been added, which lets the natural flavor of the meat really shine.

name: Seared Prime Steak
description: Raw prime meat cooked over an open flame. The outside is perfectly browned, while the inside is mouthwateringly juicy.

name: Seared Steak
description: Raw meat cooked over an open flame. Cooking it has increased its flavor and the number of hearts it provides.

name: Sneaky River Escargot
description: Sneaky river snail roasted whole in its shell. The meat is soft and a little chewy. Pulling all the meat from the shell in one go fills you with a sense of accomplishment.

name: Toasty Chillshroom
description: A fully roasted chillshroom. It's evenly toasted and tastes a low better than when eaten raw. Eating it will restore a bit of health.

name: Toasty Endura Shroom
description: A toasted endura shroom. It doesn't grant any special effects, but boy is it tasty!

name: Toasted Hearty Truffle
description: A hearty truffle with a toasted, crispy outside and warm, gooey inside.

name: Toasted Big Hearty Truffle
description: This big hearty truffle has been roasted whole. It gets full points for aroma and nutrition. Eat it to recover a lot of hearts.

name: Toasty Ironshroom
description: An ironshroom exposed to an open flame. Its once-tough exterior is now crunchy and tasty. Restores a bit of health.

name: Toasty Hylian Shroom
description: A Hylian Shroom toasted to perfection. The taste and fragrance are amplified, restoring more health to its consumer.

name: Toasty Razorshroom
description: A razorshroom that's been exposed to direct heat. Its sharp exterior has softened considerably. Restores a bit of health.

name: Toasty Rushroom
description: A rushroom that's been put to the torch. It may have lost its speedy properties, but at least it tastes good now.

name: Toasty Silent Shroom
description: A whole, toasted silent shroom. High heat may have destroyed its soft glow, but it's now fragrant and taasty.

name: Toasty Stamella Shroom
description: This toasted Stamella Shroom doesn't grant any special effects, but it will restore one and a half hearts.

name: Toasty Sunshroom
description: It's always a good idea to keep a fully roasted sunshroom or two on hand just in case. Eat it to recover a bit of health.

name: Toasty Zapshroom
description: It's not very shocking that this fully roasted zapshroom is delicious. Eat it to recover a bit of health.

name: Fairy Tonic
description: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.
